description.zh-cn: 三国时期蜀汉的将领，征南将军赵云的次子。他担任牙门将，在跟随姜维北伐期间于沓中战死。
description.en: A military general of the state of Shu Han during the Three Kingdoms period, and the second son of General Who Conquers the South, Zhao Yun. He served as a Gate General (Yamen Jiang) and was killed in action at Tazhong while following Jiang Wei on the northern expeditions.

description.zh-cn: 三国时期蜀汉的著名将领，官至征南将军。
description.en: A renowned military general of the state of Shu Han during the Three Kingdoms period, who held the rank of General Who Conquers the South.

description.zh-cn: 三国时期蜀汉的将领，赵云的长子。他继承了父亲的爵位，官至虎贲中郎督。
description.en: A military general of the state of Shu Han during the Three Kingdoms period, and the eldest son of Zhao Yun. He inherited his father's title and served as a Commandant of the Tiger Guards (Huben Zhonglang Du).

description.zh-cn: 中国三国时期的政权之一，由刘备建立。
description.en: One of the three major states that competed for supremacy over China during the Three Kingdoms period, founded by Liu Bei.

description.zh-cn: 三国时期蜀汉的著名将领，多次率军北伐曹魏。
description.en: A prominent military general of the state of Shu Han during the Three Kingdoms period, who led multiple northern expeditions against the rival state of Cao Wei.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上介于东汉与西晋之间的一段历史时期，主要有曹魏、蜀汉、东吴三个政权。
description.en: A period in Chinese history between the Eastern Han and Western Jin dynasties, featuring the tripartite division of China among the states of Cao Wei, Shu Han, and Eastern Wu.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国河北省的一个县，在三国时期被称为常山真定。
description.en: A county in Hebei Province, People's Republic of China, known as Changshan Zhending during the Three Kingdoms period.

description.zh-cn: 三国时期的军事要地，位于今甘肃省境内。
description.en: A strategic military location during the Three Kingdoms period, situated in modern-day Gansu Province.

description.zh-cn: 三国时期蜀汉将领姜维对曹魏发动的一系列军事行动。
description.en: A series of military campaigns launched by the Shu Han general Jiang Wei against the rival state of Cao Wei during the Three Kingdoms period.

description.zh-cn: 中国古典四大名著之一，是一部关于三国时期历史的章回体长篇小说。
description.en: One of the Four Great Classical Novels of Chinese literature, it is a historical novel about the Three Kingdoms period.

description.zh-cn: 三国时期蜀汉的丞相，杰出的政治家和军事家。
description.en: The chancellor of the state of Shu Han during the Three Kingdoms period, an outstanding statesman and military strategist.

description.zh-cn: 三国时期蜀汉的第二位也是最后一位皇帝。
description.en: The second and last emperor of the state of Shu Han during the Three Kingdoms period.

description.zh-cn: 蜀汉的都城，现为中国四川省的省会。
description.en: The capital city of Shu Han, now the provincial capital of Sichuan, China.

description.zh-cn: 由香港漫画家陈某创作的，以三国时代为背景的漫画作品。
description.en: A manhua series created by Hong Kong artist Chen Mou, set against the backdrop of the Three Kingdoms era.

description.zh-cn: 香港漫画家，《火凤燎原》的作者。
description.en: A Hong Kong manhua artist, the author of 'The Ravages of Time'.

description.zh-cn: 赵广是赵云的次子。
description.en: Zhao Guang is the second son of Zhao Yun.

description.zh-cn: 赵广是赵统的弟弟。
description.en: Zhao Guang is the younger brother of Zhao Tong.

description.zh-cn: 赵统是赵云的长子。
description.en: Zhao Tong is the eldest son of Zhao Yun.

description.zh-cn: 赵广在蜀汉担任牙门将。
description.en: Zhao Guang served as a Gate General in the state of Shu Han.

position.en: Commandant of the Tiger Guards, acting Commander

description.zh-cn: 赵统在父亲赵云去世后，在蜀汉官至虎贲中郎督，行领军。
description.en: After his father Zhao Yun's death, Zhao Tong served in Shu Han, reaching the position of Commandant of the Tiger Guards and acting Commander.

description.zh-cn: 赵广作为牙门将，曾随同姜维参与北伐。
description.en: As a Gate General, Zhao Guang followed Jiang Wei to participate in the northern expeditions.

description.zh-cn: 赵广在跟随姜维于沓中进行北伐作战时，不幸临阵战死。
description.en: Zhao Guang was killed in action at Tazhong while fighting in a battle during Jiang Wei's northern expeditions.

description.zh-cn: 赵广的籍贯是常山真定，即今天的河北省正定县。
description.en: Zhao Guang's ancestral home was Changshan Zhending, which is present-day Zhengding County, Hebei.

description.zh-cn: 姜维是蜀汉后期北伐战争的主要领导者和推动者。
description.en: Jiang Wei was the main leader and promoter of the northern expeditions during the late Shu Han period.

description.zh-cn: 在漫画《火凤燎原》中，赵广以“燎原广”的虚构身份登场，并被设定为主角燎原火（赵云）的义子。
description.en: In the manhua 'The Ravages of Time', Zhao Guang appears under the fictional identity 'Liaoyuan Guang' and is portrayed as the adopted son of the protagonist Liaoyuan Huo (Zhao Yun).

description.zh-cn: 陈某是漫画《火凤燎原》的创作者。
description.en: Chen Mou is the creator of the manhua 'The Ravages of Time'.

description.zh-cn: 在历史小说《三国演义》中，赵广与其兄赵统向诸葛亮报告了父亲的死讯，并被后主刘禅任命为牙门将守卫父亲的坟墓，这部分情节与史实有所不同。
description.en: In the historical novel 'Romance of the Three Kingdoms', Zhao Guang and his brother Zhao Tong reported their father's death to Zhuge Liang and were appointed by the Later Lord Liu Shan as Gate Generals to guard their father's tomb, a plot point that differs from historical records.
